title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.451 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.451 - Scope

State Regulations

Sections 255.452 through
255.491
of this Part prescribe
minimum requirements for the protection of metallic pipelines from external, internal, and atmospheric corrosion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.451

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
